content: I'm glad you're open to trying new herbal teas! I've been enjoying chamomile tea before bed, and it's been really helping me wind down. I've also been trying to cut down on my caffeine intake, so it's nice to have some herbal options. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for tea accessories, like infusers or mugs? I've been using a simple tea ball, but I'm curious about other options.
